level.heading: EXTENSION OF TIME TO SUBMIT PEER REVIEW REPORT (ยง 17-2554)

level.text: 2554.1 Sponsoring organizations may grant an extension of time to a firm to complete the peer review program process.
If a firm is granted an extension of time, the firm shall immediately submit to the Board a copy of a letter from the sponsoring organization that granted the extension.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 5186, 5190 (May 18, 2012).
